descriptionHtml:
[center]A Whiterun overhaul that I did for myself, But I figured someone else might appreciate it and get some use out of it!
Adds dozens of clutter items, Idle markers, and overall makes Whiterun a much more lively & lived in trading hub.
Doesn't add any New Vendors / New NPCs. 
I designed it with Popular Cities in mind.



The Biggest Change™:

-Camilla talks about having fresh loaves for sale, No loaves to be found.
-Added Said Bread. [/center]

[center][b]FAQ:
[/b]
Requirements?
Just the DLCs! Though I [b]highly [/b]recommend you download[b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76359?]The SLO - Stone Walls[/url] mod.[/b]
You don't have to and I have included a version for those who don't!

[/center][center] "Yet Another Whiterun Overhaul? Lana What Do You Think You're Doing "
My Best. 


Screenshots are always appreciated,
And Enjoy! [/center]
author: Pipbois
